content:
User: Misunderstanding the Attachment: It’s treating the attachment as a queryable document (e.g., something to summarize or extract specific info from) rather than a plain text file containing the transcript itself.

Grok: Partial Success: It can extract specific sections like [JESSE PROMPT] and [GROK RESPONSE] when asked directly, as shown in the last two lines of the thinking notes. This is a clue to what it’s capable of.
